response.summary: Systems and Computer Engineer from the National University of Colombia, inclined to software development, I have had the opportunity to work on various projects, both personal and professional, hand in hand with continuous learning to achieve each of the proposed objectives.  I have experience in software architectures, developing web applications (fullstack) working with web development frameworks such as Phoenix, as well as mobile applications with the React Native framework. Systems engineer #software developer #software developer #fullstack developer #software architecture #web developer #Phoenix
response.skills: XML, Git, Aprendizaje permanente, Servicios web de RESTful, Computación en la nube, Patrones de diseño, Servicios web, Integración continua, Metodologías ágiles, Spring Framework, Comunicación, Microservicios, Desarrollo web back end, Programación, Hojas de estilos en cascada (CSS), Arquitectura de sistemas, Programación orientada a objetos (POO), Performance Testing, Amazon Web Services (AWS), Amazon Relational Database Service (RDS)

profile_positions.description:
I work as a junior full-stack developer, My rol at enterprise is design and develop software architectures that is based in micro-services like too, handle usability part in the web portals for the best interaction with final users, I have tasks as: 

• Create design documents for projects.
• Develop the back-end of software architectures.
• Develop the front-end of software architectures.
• Web portal design.
profile_positions.title: Junior Full Stack Developer

profile_positions.description: Video game developer, I've been working on the creation of a video game for Android based on a project called Video Game Based Learning: A strategy for understanding and evaluating the subject "Psychological Knowledge Construction".
profile_positions.title: Assistant Developer

company.name: PersonalSoft
company.description:
Leaders across the Americas in IT Staff Augmentation, Software Product Development, Intelligent Process Automation, Smart Process y Analytics. Today we are more than 800 Softers and with offices in Atlanta, Medellin, Bogota, Panama, Dominican Republic and El Salvador.

PersonalSoft has received the CMMI Level 5 (Capability Maturity Model Integration) assessment for the third time, supporting the experience, quality and reliability of our software products and development.
